name: Percipo
tag_list: artificial-intelligence, face-description, face-recognition, age-estimate, gender-estimate, demographics, age, gender, ethnicity, photo-analysis, video-analysis
overview:
Percipo designs and builds Artificial Intelligence software for consumer and enterprise applications with a goal of fundamentally changing how computers interact with humans.

Its Perception Engine™ can guess information such as age, gender, perceived attractiveness and many other facial attributes with high accuracy and speed.

It is the first company to put this advanced technology into the hands of consumers through its proof-of-concept iPhone apps (see website).

Percipo has packaged its core technology into a Software Development Kit that is available for all popular platforms. It is currently licensing this SDK to other companies in various verticals.
